nodes.text: A butterfly-like creature existed on the Forest Moon of Endor. With a red body and large, black-spotted, yellow wings, the creature appeared harmless to the moon's native frog-like creatures, which sometimes waited on victorias and attempted to catch the flying creatures on their tongues. However, the butterfly-like creature was actually carnivorous and powerful enough to lift a the frog-like creature into the air. The creature's flexible body expanded to accommodate the size of its prey, allowing it to devour its meal whole while still in flight.

This butterfly-like creature goes unnamed during its brief appearance in "The Season Scepter," the thirteenth episode of the second season of the Ewoks television series. "The Season Scepter," written by Bob Carrau and directed by Raymond Jafelice, first aired on November 1, 1986.
